translations.translation: So glorify the name of your Lord, the Magnificent!
So glorify your Lord, the most supreme.
Glorify, then, (O Prophet), the name of your Great Lord.
(Muhammad), glorify your Lord, the Great One.
Therefore (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) proclaim the Purity of the name of your Lord, the Greatest.
Then glorify with praises the Name of your Lord, the Most Great.
Therefore glorify the name of your Lord, the Great.
Then magnify the Name of thy Lord, the All-mighty.
Therefor (O Muhammad), praise the name of thy Lord, the Tremendous.
So glorify the name of your Lord, the Supreme.
Wherefore hallow thou the name of thy Lord, the Mighty.
So celebrate the Name of your Lord, the All-supreme.
Then celebrate with praises the name of thy Lord, the Supreme!
Then glorify with praises the Name of your Lord, the Most Great.
Then, exalt the Name of your Lord, the Great.
So glorify the Name of your Great Lord.
So exalt the name of your Lord, the Most Great.
[56:74] So glorify, exalt the transcendence [of], the Name (ism is extra) of your Lord, the Tremendous, God.

(Therefore (0 Muhammad), praise the name of thy Lord, the Tremendous) therefore pray in the name of your Lord, the Mighty; it is also said that this means: remember the divine Oneness of your Lord, the Mighty.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبالجملة: { فَسَبِّحْ } يا أكمل الرسل { بِٱسْمِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَظِيمِ } [الواقعة: 74] الذي هو أعز وأجل من أن يطرأ عليه شيء من النقائص، أو يحوم حول حماء قدسه شائبة العظ والقصور، وإذا كان شأن الحق هذا { فَلاَ } حاجة إلى القسم لإثبات عظمته سبحانه وجلالة قدره وقدرته، بل { أُقْسِمُ بِمَوَاقِعِ ٱلنُّجُومِ } [الواقعة: 75] أي: بموارد وقوع نجوم القرآن، ونزولها في قلوب الكمل من أرباب العزائم والعرفان
